content: Hi all. We're seeing a lot of errors returned when we run our FHIR messages through HAPI's instance validator. We think it could be something to do with a missing package. Is anybody able to advise how we're able to validate against multiple NPM packages? We've loaded one package based on the example here - https://hapifhir.io/hapi-fhir/docs/validation/instance_validator.html#packages - but can't figure out how to load multiple packages. Any help greatly appreciated.
